name: Disco Rats
description:
In this game you don't stay hidden with sneaking, instead you have to dance to the music or else the rats will become suspicious...

How to play:

- Touch the rat with the loot icon over its head to loot (and score points!)

- Dance with the rats to avoid suspicion (action prompts respond to WASD and SPACE)

- You lose if a rat becomes too suspicious of you. Happens if you miss too many action queues!

HAVE FUN!

NOTE:

There is a bug in the game which sometimes prevents the first loot to be spawned. Just press R to restart.
